localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
blogPost.body: 👋 Clubhouse has very unique image shape and we decided to make a tool for creating colorful borders. This is a weekend project which we made together with @muratcorlu 🚀 It is open source don't worry about your privacy!
blogPost.title: Chpic - Create a colorful ring for your profile picture on Clubhouse
blogPost.author: Farid Movsumov

localize.description: 👋 会所有非常独特的图像形状，我们决定做一个工具来创建多彩的边框。这是我们和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一个周末项目，它是开源的，不用担心你的隐私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上为你的个人档案图片设计一个彩色的戒指。

localize.description: 👋 會所有非常獨特的圖像形狀，我們決定做一個工具來創建多彩的邊框。這是我們和 @muratcorlu 🚀一起做的一個週末項目，它是開源的，不用擔心你的隱私。
localize.tagline: 在Clubhouse上爲你的個人檔案圖片設計一個彩色的戒指。

previous.excerpt: Stop interrupting with @channel! Usually anyone can answer so why do we keep distracting everyone? Tellspin makes it easy to create schedules / escalation policies for Slack. Share the load with your team members with built-in user groups/@mentions.
previous.title: Tellspin - Automatic user group / @mention rotation in Slack

localize.description: 别再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，为什么我们要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin让你轻松为Slack创建日程/升级策略。通过内置的用户组/@mentions与你的团队成员分担负荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自动轮流使用用户组/@mention

localize.description: 別再用@channel打岔了! 通常任何人都可以回答，爲什麼我們要一直分散大家的注意力？Tellspin讓你輕鬆爲Slack創建日程/升級策略。通過內置的用戶組/@mentions與你的團隊成員分擔負荷。
localize.tagline: 在Slack中自動輪流使用用戶組/@mention

next.excerpt: Google Analytics meets intelligent algorithms: find hidden conversion opportunities in your Google Analytics data. A tool that analyzes your data and shows exactly how to improve your conversion rates. Offers audits and 24/7 monitoring of Google Analytics.
next.title: Convertmind - Google analytics monitoring & audits to increase conversions

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics数据中找到隐藏的转化机会。一个分析您的数据并准确显示如何提高您的转化率的工具。提供对Google Analytics的审计和24/7监控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析监测和审计，以提高转换率。

localize.description: Google Analytics遇上智能算法：在你的Google Analytics數據中找到隱藏的轉化機會。一個分析您的數據並準確顯示如何提高您的轉化率的工具。提供對Google Analytics的審計和24/7監控。
localize.tagline: 谷歌分析監測和審計，以提高轉換率。
